title: GameChanger: The onboarding wallet
description: Infrastructure barriers, poor docs, costs, inheritances and user interface complexities are pulling us apart from onboarding newcomers
solution: We must build for emerging countries. Gamify wallets, use PWAs, almost-no-code dapp connections, focus on students and junior devs first.
experience: We made **GameChanger**, a highly humanized and gamified wallet, committed to newcomers, students and builders, made in an emerging country.
